changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_bank_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_bank_event_log GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_bank_event_log @id INT, @guild_id dbo.id_t, @valult_id TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Bank_Event_Logs WHERE id = @id AND guild_id = @guild_id AND valult_id =@valult_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_bank_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_bank_event_log GO
